about_the_game:
In this 2.5D adventure...

a boy named Thomas and his friend Evey are trusted to deliver a package. Together they must travel through several towns to their goal. Little do they know there is a force stalking them, and what they carry will decide the future.

Each town poses a...

different challenge. You will need to talk to the locals, gather items, and do favours to make your way through.

Biking sections will...

test your skills. You need to dodge obstacles set up by an evil foe to make it to the next town. The Bike Shop Owner will teach you new abilities and give you new gadgets for your bike.

Features:

  • A wonderful mix of 2D and 3D graphics.
  • Dramatic, hand drawn cutscenes.
  • Multiple endings.
  • Meaningful story, with a variety of characters.
  • Created by a group of friends, bursting at the seams with personality.
  • Uncover the mystery of the whittled horse...
